config.simpleshulkerpreview.title: Simple Shulker Preview
config.simpleshulkerpreview.disable.tool: Disables the mod so that overlay icons are not displayed.
config.simpleshulkerpreview.unique.toolt: Only displays icons on shulker boxes holds one item type.
config.simpleshulkerpreview.display_item: Set which item in the shulker should be displayed.
